text: Consider socket API on a Linux machine that supports connected UDP sockets. A connected UDP socket is a UDP socket on which connect function has already been called. Which of the following statements is/are CORRECT? 1. A connected UDP socket can be used to communicate with multiple peers simultaneously. 11. A process can successfully call connect function again for an already connected UDP socket. A.Tonly B. I only C.BothIand I D. Neither I nor IT gatecse-2017-set2 computer-networks udp
